description: These are the most common form of kaomoji moustache. Probably because you can just stick a ┏ and ┓beside the mouth on any kaomoji and suddenly it has a nice big droopy moustache. These moustaches make any emoticon look more wise and so they are perfect to use if you want your opinion to appear more insightful than usual. Go ahead and give it a try. title: ┏ and ┓Style Moustaches
